story: Margarethe Richter was a paleoanthropologist and celebrity thef with a specialty in ancient food preparation and di Shes, Her exotic cuisines raised her to renown acress Europe, where di Shes from the ancient world graced. modern dining tables, sometimes for the first time in millennia. Shes retired from the spotlight, but still delights in exotic di Shes,.
